attributes.action: Discuss not following the will of the people
attributes.background: I am absolutely disgusted by the those who pertain to represent myself and others like me, The Westminster parliament has done everything it can to delay and ultimately stop brexit from ever happening this is so anti democratic and we all should protest in the strongest way possible.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand you're concerned about the UK leaving the EU, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

There are already petitions about this issue. You might like to sign one of these if it calls for something you'd like to happen. You are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
